ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Tambourine
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yea, good idea. That would work well, as long as there s only 2. Have them DT each other. :-) I ve read lots of posts where people have level 50 support.
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:11 AM 1/13/01 -0500, Moss wrote:

> > Yah, two DT's would be bad, 3 would be death since I'm a scrawny wood elf
> > bard and only have 840 hp's with equip.
>
> You can charm a scrawny crit and send him in as your alter ego to take
>the Harm Touch for you. Me, I just took a "rooter" friend with me,
>invis'ed us to a safe point, pulled them there and chanted them to
>death. Worked well. No sweat.
>
> :)

Yea, good idea. That would work well, as long as there's only 2. Have them
DT each other. :-) I've read lots of posts where people have level 50
support. But a level 35 bard could do this solo with only a small chance of
dying. "Charming" them is a very nice idea for pulling, if you are able to
find a safer area and then start to kill a bunch of them.

My suggestion of getting a SOW, invising and tracking down a scrounger,
Dot'ing him, then running out of the canyon invis, was only 1 possible way
to do it. I've read of some people finding safe areas in the canyons, but I
don't know where those are. Made me too nervous sitting down there amongst
all of them.

---Windleaf
